00002 #define DhcRawChipContent_hh 1
00003 
00004 #define SHIFT_V 0
00005 #define SHIFT_DCAL 2
00006 #define SHIFT_DCOL 7
00007 #define SHIFT_DCON 11
00008 
00009 #define MASK_V    0x00000002
00010 #define MASK_DCAL 0x0000007c
00011 #define MASK_DCOL 0x00000780
00012 #define MASK_DCON 0x00007800
00013 
00014 #define SHIFT_TRG 0
00015 #define SHIFT_DBT 1
00016 #define SHIFT_ERR 2
00017 #define SHIFT_CHKSUM 6
00018 #define SHIFT_VERSUM 14
00019 
00020 #define MASK_TRG    0x00000001
00021 #define MASK_DBT    0x00000002
00022 #define MASK_ERR    0x0000003c
00023 #define MASK_CHKSUM 0x00003fc0
00024 #define MASK_VERSUM 0x003fc000
00025

00062   DhcRawChipContent() {
00063     //Initialisation of data members
00064     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntCrateNr, 0);
00065     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr, 0);
00066     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntHitsHi, 0);
00067     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntHitsLo, 0);
00068     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntTimeStamp, 0);
00069     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo, 0);
00070   };
00071   
00073   DhcRawChipContent(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) 
00074   { 
00075     assert ( _obj->getNFloat() == 0 );
00076     assert ( _obj->getNDouble() == 0 );
00077     assert ( _obj->getNInt() == kDhcRawChipIntValues );
00078   }

00085   DhcRawChipContent &setCrateNumber(unsigned int cratenr) {
00086     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntCrateNr, static_cast<int>(cratenr)); 
00087     return *this;
00088   }
00089   
00090   unsigned int getCrateNumber() const { 
00091     return static_cast<unsigned int>(getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntCrateNr));
00092   }

00095   DhcRawChipContent &setElecChannel(unsigned int vmead, unsigned int dcalad, unsigned int dcolad, unsigned int dconad) {
00096     unsigned int elecad (
00097                          ( ( (vmead) << SHIFT_V ) |
00098                          (   (dcalad) << SHIFT_DCAL ) |    
00099                          (   (dcolad) << SHIFT_DCOL ) |    
00100                          (   (dconad) << SHIFT_DCON ) ) & 0xffff);
00101     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr, static_cast<int>(elecad)); 
00102     return *this;
00103   }
00104   
00106   int getElecChannel() const {
00107     return getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr);
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00112   unsigned int getVmeAddress() const { 
00113     return static_cast<unsigned int>(  (getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr) & MASK_V) >> SHIFT_V);
00114   }
00115 
00116   unsigned int getDcalAddress() const { 
00117     return static_cast<unsigned int>(  (getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr) & MASK_DCAL) >> SHIFT_DCAL);
00118   }
00119 
00120   unsigned int getDcolAddress() const { 
00121     return static_cast<unsigned int>(  (getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr) & MASK_DCOL) >> SHIFT_DCOL);
00122   }
00123 
00124   unsigned int getDconAddress() const { 
00125     return static_cast<unsigned int>(  (getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntElecAdr) & MASK_DCON) >> SHIFT_DCON);
00126   }

00161   DhcRawChipContent &setMiscInfo(bool trg, bool dbt, unsigned char err, unsigned char chksum, unsigned char versum) {
00162     unsigned int miscinfo (
00163                          ( ( (trg) << SHIFT_TRG ) |
00164                          (   (dbt) << SHIFT_DBT ) |    
00165                          (   (err) << SHIFT_ERR ) |    
00166                          (   (chksum) << SHIFT_CHKSUM ) |
00167                          (   (versum) << SHIFT_VERSUM ) ) & 0xffffff);
00168     obj()->setIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo, static_cast<int>(miscinfo)); 
00169     return *this;
00170   }
00171 
00173   bool getTrgInfo() {
00174     return static_cast<bool>((getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo) & MASK_TRG) >> SHIFT_TRG);
00175   }
00176 
00178   bool getDbtInfo() {
00179     return static_cast<bool>((getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo) & MASK_DBT) >> SHIFT_DBT);
00180   }
00181 
00183   unsigned char getErrInfo() {
00184     return static_cast<unsigned int>((getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo) & MASK_ERR) >> SHIFT_ERR);
00185   }

00189   unsigned char getChkSum() {
00190     return static_cast<unsigned char>((getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo) & MASK_CHKSUM) >> SHIFT_CHKSUM);
00191   }
00192 
00194   unsigned char getVerSum() {
00195     return static_cast<unsigned char>((getIntVal(kDhcRawChipIntMiscInfo) & MASK_VERSUM) >> SHIFT_VERSUM);
00196   }
